pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Hayes – Aligning with the Customer’s Needs
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Dr. Hayes first?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A. During my previous talks with Dr. Bennett, we’ve discussed therapy and treatment options for depression. Can you tell me more about the opportunities for treating depression that you see?
B. With the ongoing healthcare reform and increasing regulations, what issues do you see potentially affecting your practice?
C. It sounds like protecting your practice’s reputation, as well as expanding your practice, are two of your priorities. What are your next steps to address those priorities?

D. From previous conversations with Dr. Bennett, I’ve learned that you want to continue building your practice’s reputation and patient base. In order to achieve those goals, what are the short- and long-term patient outcomes you want to see?
